authors.name: Prabhat Sharma
authors.bio: Prabhat Sharma is the founder of Zinc Labs. He has deep background in cloud, kubernetes, observability and more. He has interests in machine learning, liberal arts, economics and systems architecture. In his spare time he spends time playing with his kids.

authors.name: Ashish Kolhe
authors.bio: Ashish is obsessed with building high performance systems with simplicity in mind. He has vast experience in multiple disciplines like front end, back end, streaming, analytics and more.
